body.p: It would have been undesirable for the Board’s decisions on reclassification to continue to fluctuate over time in line with changes in the composition of the Board and in the Board’s approach. Accordingly, the 2018 Conceptual Framework sets out the principle that the Board will apply in making decisions about reclassification.
